detailsData.title: Personal Attention
detailsData.content: Since our founding in 1984, we have recovered over One Billion Dollars for our clients. We do not charge a fee unless we win your case!

detailsData.title: Dedicated Legal Team
detailsData.content: Our team of experienced injury attorneys have more than 100 years of combined experience fighting for the rights of injured victims in New York and New Jersey.

detailsData.title: Results Driven
detailsData.content: Receive the personal attention you deserve. We are very selective in the cases we choose to represent. When we commit to you, you can count on us to adamantly fight for your rights every step.

detailsData.title: Community Support
detailsData.content: Although GLK has recorded many successes in the courtroom, our proudest achievements have come from our work within our local communities, including support for The Gardiner Foundation.

subHeading: New York and New Jersey Personal Injury Attorneys
valueProp: In 1984, Andrew L. Libo and Edward H. Gersowitz founded Gersowitz & Libo, P.C. after successful careers working with the legendary F. Lee Bailey and Aaron J. Broder. Jeff S. Korek left a Wall Street defense firm to join the firm as a named partner in 1992. We founded the firm over 25 years ago based upon the goal of offering the best legal services to people suffering from the negligence of others, Libo said of founding the firm with Gersowitz: “I am so proud that after all of these years our values have not changed as we continue to represent those who need it most”

testimonalData.text: I was injured in 2011 and spent nearly 8 years with Ed Gersowitz and Jeff Korek. Their professionalism and care was beyond. The process was long and at times exhausting…
testimonalData.author: Jeremy N.

testimonalData.text: GLK provided excellent services for my lawsuit. I would work with them again and recommend them highly for anyone looking for a law firm that is attentive and responsive to clients' needs. And they provided great results!
testimonalData.author: Ann Marie Baranowski

testimonalData.text: Great law firm, I highly recommend retaining them to make sure you are properly represented in your accident case.
testimonalData.author: K. J.
